Title: I Got This on Lock
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Randy Huggins, Vladimir Cvetko (executive story editor), Safia Dirie (story editor), Jeff Dix (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact.
